content.question: In paragraph 1, sentence 2 (“Whatever our . . . Homo sapiens”), the author uses a similar structure in the first two phrases primarily to

choices.label: emphasize that the statement about character that follows can be applied universally
highlight the relationship between natural ability and the choices people make
signal a lack of interest regarding the physical human bodies mentioned earlier
reinforce a criticism of the belief that humans lack control of their decisions

content.answer: emphasize that the statement about character that follows can be applied universally

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
